definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: That evening when she entered the theatre the manager had a most pleasant greeting for her.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，当她走进戏院时，经理极其和悦地招呼她。

sentences.english: "Is Mr. Drouet in?" said Hurstwood blandly.
sentences.chinese: “杜洛埃先生在家吗？”赫斯渥和悦地说。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat-sen visited back and Yuet Chau.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山视察过后，回到和悦洲。

sentences.english: When she speaks, she remains pleasant-faced and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 说话的时候，她一直保持和悦的表情，一直在微笑。

sentences.english: The amenity of his manners won him many friends.
sentences.chinese: 他和悦的态度替他赢得很多朋友。

sentences.english: It also made the people happy to hear the friendly birds singing.
sentences.chinese: 听到鸟儿和悦的歌声，人们也很快活。

definition: to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
Heshun county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
